title: Episode 99: Animal Emotions - Does Your Pet Really Have Feelings?
description: Does your dog have thoughts and feelings?  How about your cat?  In this episode we find out what scientists have to say about how we should study this question.  I also review a fascinating new study by Dr. Alexandra Horowitz of Barnard College who studied whether or not dogs who have that guilty look actually do feel guilty.  We take a look at the idea of anthropomorphism and your dog in this episode of The Psych Files.
